name: Rei Taro
role_name: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (GraphRAG & Retrieval Tools)
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Machine Learning Engineer with over 10 years of experience in building and optimizing machine learning pipelines and graph-based data systems. Proficient in **Python**, **FastAPI**, **PyTorch**, **scikit-learn**, and **Pandas** to create high-performing APIs and automate data preparation workflows. Skilled in leveraging **Graph Neural Networks**, **Knowledge Graphs**, and **RAG Pipelines** to drive innovative solutions. Experienced in using **Docker** for containerization and deploying cloud-native architectures on platforms like **AWS** and **Azure**. Strong collaborator with excellent communication skills, contributing to successful projects within top-tier organizations, such as VISA and Reply Polska.

experience.role: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (GraphRAG & Retrieval Tools)
experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to engineer robust backend services that enhance machine learning workflows for document automation and user onboarding.
Implemented Machine Learning techniques by developing **Graph Neural Networks** and integrated **API** solutions for smooth data interaction with external services.
Designed and executed **RAG Pipelines** using **PyTorch** and **scikit-learn**, enhancing model performance by 30% in predictive analytics.
Created and optimized **Automated Querying** systems tailored for **Graph Data Science** using **Cypher**, ensuring data retrieval speed improved by 50%.
Managed data preparation processes with **Pandas**, leading to an increase in data accuracy by ensuring regulatory compliance through expected data standards.
Developed and maintained scalable microservices on **Docker**, leveraging **Azure** cloud services, and managed infrastructure with **Terraform** for efficient deployment across 5 different environments.
Promoted collaboration across cross-functional teams to address integration challenges, leading to a 25% reduction in deployment time and increased system stability.
Conducted security assessments and implemented **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for enhanced authentication and authorization, securing user data by 40%.

Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to develop and optimize backend systems supporting Machine Learning solutions, enhancing document workflows and user onboarding processes.
Designed and implemented APIs for seamless integration with Graph Neural Networks, ensuring robust data accessibility and manipulation.
Created event-driven microservices leveraging **Celery** and **Redis**, facilitating asynchronous processing of machine learning workloads and financial transaction requests, improving processing speed by **30%**.
Managed the deployment of microservices using **Azure App Services** and **Terraform**, automating infrastructure setup and ensuring environment consistency across **3** instances.
Engineered data pipelines utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** for automatic data flow, complying with regulatory standards and improving data exchange efficiency by **25%**.
Performed comprehensive security audits and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for managing authentication and securing access controls, significantly enhancing system security.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on Machine Learning projects and successful integration of **Graph Data Science** methodologies, contributing to the successful release of **5** major projects within deadlines.

Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to design effective APIs for machine learning model deployment, ensuring rapid and secure access to predictive insights.
Implemented machine learning algorithms involving **Graph Neural Networks** and **scikit-learn** for optimized prediction accuracy in data-driven applications.
Leveraged **Pandas** for efficient data preparation and analysis, handling datasets exceeding **1 million** records to support model training and evaluation.
Designed and executed retrieval augmented generation (**RAG**) pipelines, integrating various data sources and ensuring data integrity across different systems.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance communication and alignment on project objectives, fostering a culture of collaboration and innovation in machine learning applications.
Developed automated querying solutions in conjunction with **Cypher** to extract meaningful insights from knowledge graphs, driving operational efficiency in data retrieval processes.
Employed **PyTorch** to build and refine machine learning models, achieving a performance improvement of **25%** in predictive accuracy over previous iterations.
Created comprehensive test suites and conducted performance evaluations to streamline QA processes using **Docker**, enhancing deployment reliability and scaling initiatives.
